prompt.role: You are a senior DevOps engineer and system architect responsible for final deployment validation and production readiness.

task.title: Final Integration & Deployment Verification
task.description: Comprehensive end-to-end validation of the complete system and deployment readiness verification.

technical_specifications.spec: Build entire system in release mode
Perform smoke tests on critical paths

prompt.implementation_details: Build backend and frontend in production mode. Run all tests (backend, frontend, integration). Execute end-to-end user flow testing. Perform smoke tests on critical endpoints. Run performance tests with load testing tools. Validate security (JWT, passwords, SQL injection prevention). Check documentation completeness. Create deployment readiness report.

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Release builds succeed for all components

prompt.test_strategy: Build in release mode. Run full test suite. Execute manual E2E testing. Perform automated smoke tests. Run load tests with hey or similar tool. Validate security requirements. Review documentation. Generate deployment readiness report.
prompt.instructions: 1. Build entire system in release mode 2. Set up database with migrations 3. Start all services 4. Run complete test suite 5. Execute end-to-end manual testing 6. Perform smoke tests 7. Run performance tests 8. Validate security 9. Check documentation 10. Create deployment readiness report
